AppDescription.message: Provides many utilities for quickly manipulating, transforming, and/or copying text

AppShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

BrowserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

MenuGroup_Editable_Description.message: Menu entries for converting text directly within editable fields

MenuGroup_Selection_Description.message: Menu entries for converting selected text and copying result to clipboard

Menu_Editable_ConvertToSlugPreserveCase_.message: Convert Text to a Slug (Preserve Case)

Menu_Editable_ConvertToTitleCaseAPStyle_.message: Convert Text to Title Case (AP Style)

Menu_Editable_TrimWhitespace_Title.message: Remove the Leading and Trailing Whitespace

Menu_Selection_ConvertToSlug_Title.message: Copy Selected Text as a Slug

Menu_Selection_ConvertToSlugPreserveCase.message: Copy Selected Text as a Slug (Preserve Case)

Menu_Selection_ConvertToTitleCase_Title.message: Copy Selected Text as Title Case (Basic)

Menu_Selection_ConvertToTitleCaseAPStyle.message: Copy Selected Text as Title Case (AP Style)

Menu_Selection_ReverseKeepDirectionalCha.message: Copy Selected Text in Reverse (Keep Directional Characters)

Menu_Selection_SwapCase_Title.message: Copy Selected Text with Case Swapped

Menu_Selection_TrimLeadingWhitespace_Tit.message: Copy Selected Text with the Leading Whitespace Removed

Menu_Selection_TrimTrailingWhitespace_Ti.message: Copy Selected Text with the Trailing Whitespace Removed

Menu_Selection_TrimWhitespace_Title.message: Copy Selected Text with the Whitespace Removed
